snippet: BEGUN--Martin S. We mourn the passing of New York's true champion, whose extraordinary contributions will be long remembered. Deepest condolences to Louise Sunshine and the entire family. Lisa Linden, President and CEO, LAK Public Relations, Inc. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BEGUN--Martin S. We mourn the passing of New York's true champion, whose extraordinary contributions will be long remembered. Deepest condolences to Louise Sunshine and the entire family. Lisa Linden, President and CEO, LAK Public Relations, Inc. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BEGUN, MARTIN S
